sentences.sentenceQuestion: The man with the green umbrella just crossed the street
sentences.sentenceTranslated: Bărbatul cu umbrela verde tocmai a traversat strada

sentences.sentenceQuestion: Do you know where the closest store is
sentences.sentenceTranslated: Știi unde este cel mai apropiat magazin

sentences.sentenceQuestion: If you don't wake up now, you will miss your train
sentences.sentenceTranslated: Dacă nu te trezești acum, vei pierde trenul

sentences.sentenceQuestion: I need to find the nearest gas station as fast as possible
sentences.sentenceTranslated: Trebuie să găsesc cea mai apropiată benzinărie cât mai repede posibil

sentences.sentenceQuestion: Eliot needs to find a new toy for his cat
sentences.sentenceTranslated: Eliot trebuie să găsesc o nouă jucărie pentru pisica lui
